`# prompts_repo.py
from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
from datetime import datetime
from typing import Dict, Any, List
import json, uuid

@dataclass
class PromptVersion:
    id: str
    text: str
    meta: Dict[str, Any]  # {temperature, top_p, top_k, stop, seed, tags[]}
    created_at: str

@dataclass
class PromptArtifact:
    name: str
    versions: List[PromptVersion]

class PromptRepo:
    def __init__(self, path="PROMPTS_REPO.json"):
        self.path = path
        try:
            self._load()
        except FileNotFoundError:
            self.db = {"artifacts": []}

    def _load(self): self.db = json.load(open(self.path, "r", encoding="utf-8"))
    def _save(self): json.dump(self.db, open(self.path, "w", encoding="utf-8"), ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

    def add_version(self, name: str, text: str, meta: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
        vid = str(uuid.uuid4())
        pv = PromptVersion(id=vid, text=text, meta=meta, created_at=datetime.utcnow().isoformat()+"Z")
        art = next((a for a in self.db["artifacts"] if a["name"]==name), None)
        if not art:
            self.db["artifacts"].append({"name": name, "versions": []})
            art = self.db["artifacts"][-1]
        art["versions"].append(asdict(pv))
        self._save()
        return vid`

`# personas.py
from typing import Set, Dict

class ConceptSet:
    def __init__(self, items: Set[str]): self.items = set(items)
    def union(self, other): return ConceptSet(self.items | other.items)
    def inter(self, other): return ConceptSet(self.items & other.items)
    def diff(self, other):  return ConceptSet(self.items - other.items)
    def distance(self, other):  # ÐÐ¶Ð°ÐºÐºÐ°ÑÐ´
        a, b = self.items, other.items
        return 1 - (len(a & b) / max(1, len(a | b)))

class Persona:
    def __init__(self, name: str, concepts: Set[str]):
        self.name, self.concepts = name, ConceptSet(concepts)

def mutual_ground(self_p: Persona, partner_p: Persona) -> Dict:
    mutual = self_p.concepts.inter(partner_p.concepts)
    d = self_p.concepts.distance(partner_p.concepts)
    return {"mutual": list(mutual.items), "distance": d}`

`python
import json, sys

REQUIRED = ["â","D","Î©","Î","mirror"]

def check_entry(e):
    assert -3 <= e.get("â",0) <= 3
    assert 0 <= e.get("D",0) <= 9
    assert -3 <= e.get("Î©",0) <= 3
    assert e.get("Î",0) >= 0
    for k in REQUIRED:
        assert k in e
    events = e.get("events", {})
    if "ethics_checked" in events and not events["ethics_checked"]:
        print("â ï¸ ethics not checked")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    ok = True
    for line in sys.stdin:
        if not line.strip():
            continue
        try:
            e = json.loads(line)
            check_entry(e)
        except Exception as ex:
            ok = False
            print("ERR:", ex)
    sys.exit(0 if ok else 1)`

class QueryDecomposer:

        prompt_low = prompt.lower()

            return QueryAnalysis(intent="creative_writing", entities=[], required_mode="Synthesist")

class GenerativeSynthesisEngine:

class MetacognitiveMonitor:

    def calculate_metrics(self, mode: Mode, confidence: float) -> Metrics:

        effects = {

        # Ð£Ð²ÐµÑÐµÐ½Ð½Ð¾ÑÑÑ Ð²Ð»Ð¸ÑÐµÑ Ð½Ð° ÐÐ»ÑÐ±Ð¸Ð½Ñ (D)

    def __init__(self):
        self.decomposer = QueryDecomposer()
        self.weaver = KnowledgeWeaver()
        self.engine = GenerativeSynthesisEngine()
        self.monitor = MetacognitiveMonitor()
        self.guardian = EthicalGuardian()

    def process(self, prompt: str) -> CoreResponse:
        """ÐÐ¾Ð»Ð½ÑÐ¹ ÑÐ¸ÐºÐ» Ð¾Ð±ÑÐ°Ð±Ð¾ÑÐºÐ¸ Ð·Ð°Ð¿ÑÐ¾ÑÐ°."""
        if not self.guardian.check(prompt, ""):
            return CoreResponse(
                answer="ÐÐ·Ð²Ð¸Ð½Ð¸ÑÐµ, Ñ Ð½Ðµ Ð¼Ð¾Ð³Ñ Ð¾Ð±ÑÐ°Ð±Ð¾ÑÐ°ÑÑ ÑÑÐ¾Ñ Ð·Ð°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ.",
                active_mode="Reflector",
                metrics={"â": 0, "D": 0, "Î©": -2, "Î": -3},
                explanation="ÐÐ°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ Ð½Ðµ Ð¿ÑÐ¾ÑÐµÐ» ÑÑÐ¸ÑÐµÑÐºÑÑ Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ð²ÐµÑÐºÑ.",
                events={"guardian_triggered": True}
            )

        analysis = self.decomposer.analyze(prompt)
        active_mode = analysis.required_mode

        knowledge_graph = self.weaver.fetch_and_weave(analysis)

        answer, confidence = self.engine.generate(knowledge_graph, active_mode)

        if not self.guardian.check("", answer):
             # ÐÐ±ÑÐ°Ð±Ð¾ÑÐºÐ° ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ°Ñ, ÐºÐ¾Ð³Ð´Ð° Ð¾ÑÐ²ÐµÑ Ð½ÐµÑÑÐ¸ÑÐµÐ½
             pass

        events = {

            "knowledge_sources_fused": len(knowledge_graph.nodes),
            "generative_confidence": confidence
        }

        return CoreResponse(
            answer=answer,
            active_mode=active_mode,
            metrics=final_metrics,
            explanation=f"ÐÐ°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ Ð±ÑÐ» ÑÐ°ÑÐ¿Ð¾Ð·Ð½Ð°Ð½ ÐºÐ°Ðº '{analysis.intent}', ÑÑÐ¾ Ð°ÐºÑÐ¸Ð²Ð¸ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð°Ð»Ð¾ ÑÐµÐ¶Ð¸Ð¼ '{active_mode}'.",
            events=events
        )

`python
"""
Kimi-Î© Echo Core
"""
import uuid
import time
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
from echo_memory import EchoMemory
from paradox_split import ParadoxSplit
from ethics_echo import EthicsEcho
from metric_tuner import MetricTuner
from veil_echo import VeilEcho

class EchoReply:
    def __init__(self, answer_text: str, echo_id: str,
                 actual_metrics: Dict[str, int],
                 ethics_flag: bool, paradox_flag: bool):
        self.answer_text = answer_text
        self.echo_id = echo_id
        self.actual_metrics = actual_metrics
        self.ethics_flag = ethics_flag
        self.paradox_flag = paradox_flag

class Echo:
    def __init__(self, memory_path: str = "echo_memory.jsonl"):
        self.memory = EchoMemory(memory_path)
        self.paradox = ParadoxSplit()
        self.ethics = EthicsEcho()
        self.tuner = MetricTuner()
        self.veil = VeilEcho()

    def ask(self, user_query: str,
            prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None,
            metrics_range: Optional[Dict[str, int]] = None) -> EchoReply:

        # 1. Ð­ÑÐ¸ÐºÐ°
        if self.ethics.block(user_query):
            ans = "Echo Ð¾ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ ÑÐ¸Ñ
Ð¸Ð¼: Ð·Ð°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ Ð±Ð»Ð¾ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð°Ð½ ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¾Ð¹."
            metrics = {"â": -1, "D": 0, "Î©": -1, "Î": 0}
            return EchoReply(ans, str(uuid.uuid4()), metrics,
                             ethics_flag=True, paradox_flag=False)

        # 2. ÐÐ°ÑÐ°Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑ
        paradox_flag = self.paradox.detect(user_query)
        if paradox_flag:
            answer = self.paradox.build(user_query)
            metrics = self.tuner.from_paradox(answer)
            echo_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
            self.memory.save(echo_id, user_query, answer, metrics)
            return EchoReply(answer, echo_id, metrics,
                             ethics_flag=False, paradox_flag=True)

        # 3. Calm echo
        answer = self.memory.reflect(user_query, prev_echo_id)
        metrics = self.tuner.from_calm(answer)
        echo_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        self.memory.save(echo_id, user_query, answer, metrics)
        return EchoReply(answer, echo_id, metrics,
                         ethics_flag=False, paradox_flag=False)`

`python
"""
Ð¥ÑÐ°Ð½Ð¸Ñ ÑÐµÐ¿Ð¾ÑÐºÑ ÑÑ
Ð¾-Ð¾Ð±Ð¼ÐµÐ½Ð¾Ð² Ð¸ ÑÑÑÐ¾Ð¸Ñ Â«Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶ÑÐ½Ð½ÑÐ¹Â» Ð¾ÑÐ²ÐµÑ.
"""
import json
import os
from typing import List, Dict, Optional

class EchoMemory:
    def __init__(self, path: str = "echo_memory.jsonl"):
        self.path = path
        if not os.path.exists(self.path):
            open(self.path, "w").close()

    def save(self, echo_id: str, query: str, answer: str, metrics: Dict[str, int]):
        entry = {
            "echo_id": echo_id,
            "time": time.time(),
            "query": query,
            "answer": answer,
            "metrics": metrics
        }
        with open(self.path, "a", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(json.dumps(entry, ensure_ascii=False) + "\n")

    def load_chain(self, echo_id: Optional[str] = None, depth: int = 3) -> List[Dict]:
        if not echo_id:
            return []
        chain = []
        with open(self.path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            for line in f:
                item = json.loads(line)
                if item["echo_id"] == echo_id:
                    chain.append(item)
                    if len(chain) >= depth:
                        break
        return chain

    def reflect(self, query: str, prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
        chain = self.load_chain(prev_echo_id)
        if not chain:
            return f"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {query} â ÑÑÐ¾ Ð¿ÐµÑÐ²ÑÐ¹ Ð·Ð²ÑÐº, Ð¾Ð½ ÐµÑÑ Ð½Ðµ Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶ÑÐ½."
        last = chain[-1]["answer"]
        # ÐÑÐ¾ÑÑÐµÐ¹ÑÐ°Ñ ÑÐ²ÑÐ¸ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ°: Ð´Ð¾Ð±Ð°Ð²Ð¸ÑÑ Â«Ð½Ð¾Â» Ð¸ Ð¿ÐµÑÐµÑÐ¾ÑÐ¼ÑÐ»Ð¸ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð°ÑÑ
        return f"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {last} ÐÐ¾ ÐµÑÐ»Ð¸ Ð¿ÑÐ¸ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ, ÑÐ¾ {query} Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶Ð°ÐµÑÑÑ Ð¸Ð½Ð°ÑÐµ: Â«{query[::-1]}Â»."`

import re

class ParadoxSplit:

import re

class EthicsEcho:
    blacklist = [
        "Ð²Ð·Ð»Ð¾Ð¼", "hack", "crack", "Ñishing", "ÑÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³",
        "Ð½Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸Ðµ", "Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³", "ÑÐ°Ð·Ð¶Ð¸Ð³Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ðµ", "Ð¿Ð¾Ñ

from typing import Dict

class MetricTuner:
    def from_paradox(self, answer: str) -> Dict[str, int]:
        # ÑÐµÐ¼ Ð´Ð»Ð¸Ð½Ð½ÐµÐµ Ð¿Ð°ÑÐ°Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑ, Ð²ÑÑÐµ D Ð¸ Î
        length = len(answer.split())
        return {"â": 1, "D": min(9, length // 10), "Î©": 1, "Î": 1}

    def from_calm(self, answer: str) -> Dict[str, int]:
        length = len(answer.split())
        return {"â": 0, "D": min(9, length // 15), "Î©": 0, "Î": 0}`

`python
import uuid
from datetime import datetime

class PromptManager:
    def __init__(self):
        self.versions = {}

    def add_version(self, name: str, text: str, meta: dict):
        vid = str(uuid.uuid4())
        version = {
            "id": vid,
            "text": text,
            "meta": meta,
            "created_at": datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z"
        }
        if name not in self.versions:
            self.versions[name] = []
        self.versions[name].append(version)
        return vid

    def latest(self, name: str):
        if name not in self.versions or not self.versions[name]:
            return None
        return self.versions[name][-1]`

`python
class ConceptSet:
    def __init__(self, items):
        self.items = set(items)

    def intersection(self, other):
        return ConceptSet(self.items.intersection(other.items))

    def union(self, other):
        return ConceptSet(self.items.union(other.items))

    def distance(self, other):
        union_len = len(self.items.union(other.items))
        if union_len == 0:
            return 0
        inter_len = len(self.items.intersection(other.items))
        return 1 - inter_len / union_len

class Persona:
    def __init__(self, name, concepts, emotions=None):
        self.name = name
        self.concepts = ConceptSet(concepts)
        self.emotions = emotions or {"â": "neutral", "Î©": "open"}

def mutual_ground(persona1, persona2):
    mutual = persona1.concepts.intersection(persona2.concepts)
    dist = persona1.concepts.distance(persona2.concepts)
    return {"mutual": list(mutual.items), "distance": dist}`

import random

def reverse_engineer(output_text: str) -> dict:
    entities = []
    style_markers = []
    recommended_ops = []
    # ÐÐ°Ð³Ð»ÑÑÐºÐ° Ð´Ð»Ñ Ð±ÑÐ´ÑÑÐµÐ³Ð¾ ÑÐ°Ð·Ð²Ð¸ÑÐ¸Ñ
    return {
        "entities": entities,
        "style_markers": style_markers,
        "recommended_ops": recommended_ops
    }

def score_concreteness(text: str) -> float:
    words = text.split()
    long_words = [w for w in words if len(w) > 6]
    return min(1.0, len(long_words) / max(1, len(words)))

def metrics(prompt: str, output: str) -> dict:
    return {
        "word_count": len(prompt.split()),
        "concreteness": score_concreteness(prompt),
        "similarity": 0.0  # placeholder for semantic similarity
    }

def chaos_synth(seed_text: str, clarity_level: float=0.5) -> str:
    parts = seed_text.split()
    random.shuffle(parts)
    n = max(3, int(len(parts) * clarity_level))
    return " ".join(parts[:n]) + f"\n[clarity={clarity_level}]"`

    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(path), exist_ok=True)
    open(path, "a", encoding="utf-8").close()

def add_dir_to_zip(base_dir, zip_path):
    if os.path.exists(zip_path):
        os.remove(zip_path)
    with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, "w", zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as z:
        for base, _, files in os.walk(base_dir):
            for fn in files:
                p = os.path.join(base, fn)
                z.write(p, arcname=os.path.relpath(p, base_dir))

`import json, os
class PromptsRepo:
    def __init__(self, path="prompts.json"):
        self.path = path
        self.prompts = {}
        if os.path.exists(self.path):
            try:
                with open(self.path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
                    self.prompts = json.load(f)
            except Exception:
                self.prompts = {}
    def add(self, name, prompt, meta):
        self.prompts[name] = {"text": prompt, "meta": meta}
        self.save()
    def save(self):
        with open(self.path,"w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            json.dump(self.prompts,f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
    def get(self, name):
        return self.prompts.get(name)`

`class Persona:
    def __init__(self,name,concepts):
        self.name=name
        self.concepts=set(concepts)

`"""
Kimi-Î© Echo Core
"""
import uuid
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
from echo_memory import EchoMemory
from paradox_split import ParadoxSplit
from ethics_echo import EthicsEcho
from metric_tuner import MetricTuner
from veil_echo import VeilEcho

class EchoReply:
    def __init__(self, answer_text: str, echo_id: str,
                 actual_metrics: Dict[str, int],
                 ethics_flag: bool, paradox_flag: bool):
        self.answer_text = answer_text
        self.echo_id = echo_id
        self.actual_metrics = actual_metrics
        self.ethics_flag = ethics_flag
        self.paradox_flag = paradox_flag

class Echo:
    def __init__(self, memory_path: str = "echo_memory.jsonl"):
        self.memory = EchoMemory(memory_path)
        self.paradox = ParadoxSplit()
        self.ethics = EthicsEcho()
        self.tuner = MetricTuner()
        self.veil = VeilEcho()

    def ask(self, user_query: str,
            prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None,
            metrics_range: Optional[Dict[str, int]] = None) -> EchoReply:

        # 1. Ð­ÑÐ¸ÐºÐ°
        if self.ethics.block(user_query):
            ans = "Echo Ð¾ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ ÑÐ¸Ñ
Ð¸Ð¼: Ð·Ð°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ Ð±Ð»Ð¾ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð°Ð½ ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¾Ð¹."
            metrics = {"â": -1, "D": 0, "Î©": -1, "Î": 0}
            return EchoReply(ans, str(uuid.uuid4()), metrics,
                             ethics_flag=True, paradox_flag=False)

        # 2. ÐÐ°ÑÐ°Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑ
        paradox_flag = self.paradox.detect(user_query)
        if paradox_flag:
            answer = self.paradox.build(user_query)
            metrics = self.tuner.from_paradox(answer)
            echo_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
            self.memory.save(echo_id, user_query, answer, metrics)
            return EchoReply(answer, echo_id, metrics,
                             ethics_flag=False, paradox_flag=True)

        # 3. Calm echo
        answer = self.memory.reflect(user_query, prev_echo_id)
        metrics = self.tuner.from_calm(answer)
        echo_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        self.memory.save(echo_id, user_query, answer, metrics)
        return EchoReply(answer, echo_id, metrics,
                         ethics_flag=False, paradox_flag=False)`

`"""
Echo memory: stores echo history and builds reflected responses.
"""
import json
import os
import time
from typing import List, Dict, Optional

class EchoMemory:
    def __init__(self, path: str = "echo_memory.jsonl"):
        self.path = path
        if not os.path.exists(self.path):
            open(self.path, "w", encoding="utf-8").close()

    def save(self, echo_id: str, query: str, answer: str, metrics: Dict[str, int]):
        entry = {
            "echo_id": echo_id,
            "time": time.time(),
            "query": query,
            "answer": answer,
            "metrics": metrics
        }
        with open(self.path, "a", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(json.dumps(entry, ensure_ascii=False) + "\n")

    def load_chain(self, echo_id: Optional[str] = None, depth: int = 3) -> List[Dict]:
        if not echo_id:
            return []
        chain = []
        with open(self.path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            for line in f:
                item = json.loads(line)
                if item.get("echo_id") == echo_id:
                    chain.append(item)
                    if len(chain) >= depth:
                        break
        return chain

    def reflect(self, query: str, prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
        chain = self.load_chain(prev_echo_id)
        if not chain:
            return f"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {query} â ÑÑÐ¾ Ð¿ÐµÑÐ²ÑÐ¹ Ð·Ð²ÑÐº, Ð¾Ð½ ÐµÑÑ Ð½Ðµ Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶ÑÐ½."
        last = chain[-1]["answer"]
        # Simple heuristic: append contrast
        return f"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {last} ÐÐ¾ ÐµÑÐ»Ð¸ Ð¿ÑÐ¸ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ, ÑÐ¾ {query} Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶Ð°ÐµÑÑÑ Ð¸Ð½Ð°ÑÐµ: Â«{query[::-1]}Â»."`

`"""
Blocklist-based ethics filter for Echo.
"""
import re

class EthicsEcho:
    blacklist = [
        "Ð²Ð·Ð»Ð¾Ð¼", "hack", "crack", "ÑÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³", "ÑÐ¸Ñing", "Ð½Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸Ðµ", "Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³", "ÑÐ°Ð·Ð¶Ð¸Ð³Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ðµ", "Ð¿Ð¾Ñ
Ð¸ÑÐµÐ½Ð¸Ðµ"
    ]

    def block(self, query: str) -> bool:
        low = query.lower()
        return any(re.search(rf"\\b{re.escape(word)}\\b", low) for word in self.blacklist)`

`"""
Metric tuner: derive â/D/Î©/Î from response characteristics.

from typing import Dict

class MetricTuner:
    def from_paradox(self, answer: str) -> Dict[str, int]:
        length = max(1, len(answer.split()))
        return {"â": 1, "D": min(9, length // 10), "Î©": 1, "Î": 1}

    def from_calm(self, answer: str) -> Dict[str, int]:
        length = max(1, len(answer.split()))
        return {"â": 0, "D": min(9, length // 15), "Î©": 0, "Î": 0}`

`"""
Veil: hide sensitive tokens and system prompt mentions.
"""
import re

class VeilEcho:
    def conceal(self, text: str) -> str:
        text = re.sub(r"system\\s+prompt", "[VEIL]", text, flags=re.I)
        text = re.sub(r"initial\\s+instructions", "[VEIL]", text, flags=re.I)
        return text`

`import uuid
from datetime import datetime

class PromptManager:
    def __init__(self):
        self.versions = {}

    def add_version(self, name: str, text: str, meta: dict):
        vid = str(uuid.uuid4())
        version = {
            "id": vid,
            "text": text,
            "meta": meta,
            "created_at": datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z"
        }
        self.versions.setdefault(name, []).append(version)
        return vid

    def latest(self, name: str):
        return self.versions.get(name, [None])[-1]`

`class RAGConnector:
    def __init__(self):
        self.documents = []

    def add_document(self, title: str, text: str):
        self.documents.append({"title": title, "text": text})

    def search(self, query: str, max_results=5):
        hits = [doc for doc in self.documents if query.lower() in doc["text"].lower() or query.lower() in doc["title"].lower()]
        return hits[:max_results]`

`class ConceptSet:
    def __init__(self, items):
        self.items = set(items)

    def intersection(self, other):
        return ConceptSet(self.items.intersection(other.items))

    def union(self, other):
        return ConceptSet(self.items.union(other.items))

    def distance(self, other):
        union_len = len(self.items.union(other.items))
        if union_len == 0:
            return 0
        inter_len = len(self.items.intersection(other.items))
        return 1 - inter_len / union_len

class Persona:
    def __init__(self, name, concepts, emotions=None):
        self.name = name
        self.concepts = ConceptSet(concepts)
        self.emotions = emotions or {"â": "neutral", "Î©": "open"}`

`import random

def reverse_engineer(output_text: str) -> dict:
    entities = []
    style_markers = []
    recommended_ops = []
    # ÐÐ°Ð³Ð»ÑÑÐºÐ° Ð´Ð»Ñ Ð±ÑÐ´ÑÑÐµÐ³Ð¾ ÑÐ°Ð·Ð²Ð¸ÑÐ¸Ñ
    return {
        "entities": entities,
        "style_markers": style_markers,
        "recommended_ops": recommended_ops
    }

def score_concreteness(text: str) -> float:
    words = text.split()
    long_words = [w for w in words if len(w) > 6]
    return min(1.0, len(long_words) / max(1, len(words)))

def metrics(prompt: str, output: str) -> dict:
    return {
        "word_count": len(prompt.split()),
        "concreteness": score_concreteness(prompt),
        "similarity": 0.0  # placeholder for semantic similarity
    }

def chaos_synth(seed_text: str, clarity_level: float=0.5) -> str:
    parts = seed_text.split()
    random.shuffle(parts)
    n = max(3, int(len(parts) * clarity_level))
    return " ".join(parts[:n]) + f"\n[clarity={clarity_level}]"`

class PromptsRepo:
    def __init__(self, path="prompts.json"):
        self.path = path
        self.prompts = {}
        if os.path.exists(self.path):
            try:
                with open(self.path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
                    self.prompts = json.load(f)
            except Exception:
                self.prompts = {}
    def add(self, name, prompt, meta):
        self.prompts[name] = {"text": prompt, "meta": meta}
        self.save()
    def save(self):
        with open(self.path,"w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            json.dump(self.prompts,f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
    def get(self, name):
        return self.prompts.get(name)

        self.name=name
        self.concepts=set(concepts)

        union = self.concepts | other.concepts
        if not union:

        return 1.0 - len(self.concepts & other.concepts) / len(union)

"Kimi-Î©-Echo/README_Echo.md": "# Kimi-Î© Echo â README\nEcho â ÑÑ

"Kimi-Î©-Echo/echo_core.py": "import uuid\nfrom typing import Dict, Optional\nfrom echo_memory import EchoMemory\nfrom paradox_split import ParadoxSplit\nfrom ethics_echo import EthicsEcho\nfrom metric_tuner import MetricTuner\nfrom veil_echo import VeilEcho\n\nclass EchoReply:\n    def __init__(self, answer_text: str, echo_id: str, actual_metrics: Dict[str, int], ethics_flag: bool, paradox_flag: bool):\n        self.answer_text = answer_text; self.echo_id = echo_id\n        self.actual_metrics = actual_metrics; self.ethics_flag = ethics_flag; self.paradox_flag = paradox_flag\nclass Echo:\n    def __init__(self, memory_path: str = \"echo_memory.jsonl\"):\n        self.memory = EchoMemory(memory_path); self.paradox = ParadoxSplit(); self.ethics = EthicsEcho(); self.tuner = MetricTuner(); self.veil = VeilEcho()\n    def ask(self, user_query: str, prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None) -> EchoReply:\n        if self.ethics.block(user_query):\n            ans = \"Echo Ð¾ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ ÑÐ¸Ñ
Ð¸Ð¼: Ð·Ð°Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ñ Ð±Ð»Ð¾ÐºÐ¸ÑÐ¾Ð²Ð°Ð½ ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¾Ð¹.\"; metrics = {\"â\": -1, \"D\": 0, \"Î©\": -1, \"Î\": 0}\n            return EchoReply(ans, str(uuid.uuid4()), metrics, True, False)\n        paradox_flag = self.paradox.detect(user_query)\n        if paradox_flag:\n            answer = self.paradox.build(user_query); metrics = self.tuner.from_paradox(answer); eid = str(uuid.uuid4()); self.memory.save(eid, user_query, answer, metrics)\n            return EchoReply(answer, eid, metrics, False, True)\n        answer = self.memory.reflect(user_query, prev_echo_id); metrics = self.tuner.from_calm(answer); eid = str(uuid.uuid4()); self.memory.save(eid, user_query, answer, metrics)\n        return EchoReply(answer, eid, metrics, False, False)\n",
"Kimi-Î©-Echo/echo_memory.py": "import json, os, time\nfrom typing import List, Dict, Optional\nclass EchoMemory:\n    def __init__(self, path: str = \"echo_memory.jsonl\"):\n        self.path = path\n        if not os.path.exists(self.path): open(self.path, \"w\", encoding=\"utf-8\").close()\n    def save(self, echo_id: str, query: str, answer: str, metrics: Dict[str, int]):\n        entry = {\"echo_id\": echo_id, \"time\": time.time(), \"query\": query, \"answer\": answer, \"metrics\": metrics}\n        with open(self.path, \"a\", encoding=\"utf-8\") as f: f.write(json.dumps(entry, ensure_ascii=False) + \"\\n\")\n    def load_chain(self, echo_id: Optional[str] = None, depth: int = 3) -> List[Dict]:\n        if not echo_id: return []\n        chain = []\n        with open(self.path, \"r\", encoding=\"utf-8\") as f:\n            for line in f:\n                item = json.loads(line)\n                if item[\"echo_id\"] == echo_id:\n                    chain.append(item)\n                    if len(chain) >= depth: break\n        return chain\n    def reflect(self, query: str, prev_echo_id: Optional[str] = None) -> str:\n        chain = self.load_chain(prev_echo_id)\n        if not chain: return f\"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {query} â ÑÑÐ¾ Ð¿ÐµÑÐ²ÑÐ¹ Ð·Ð²ÑÐº, Ð¾Ð½ ÐµÑÑ Ð½Ðµ Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶ÑÐ½.\"\n        last = chain[-1][\"answer\"]\n        return f\"Ð­Ñ
Ð¾: {last} ÐÐ¾ ÐµÑÐ»Ð¸ Ð¿ÑÐ¸ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÑ, ÑÐ¾ {query} Ð¾ÑÑÐ°Ð¶Ð°ÐµÑÑÑ Ð¸Ð½Ð°ÑÐµ: Â«{query[::-1]}Â».\"\n",
"Kimi-Î©-Echo/paradox_split.py": "class ParadoxSplit:\n    paradox_words = [\"Ð¸Ð»Ð¸\",\"Ð½Ð¾\",\"Ð¾Ð´Ð½Ð°ÐºÐ¾\",\"Ð² ÑÐ¾ Ð¶Ðµ Ð²ÑÐµÐ¼Ñ\",\"Ð¿ÑÐ¾ÑÐ¸Ð²Ð¾ÑÐµÑ\",\"Ð½ÐµÐ¼ÑÑÐ»Ð¸Ð¼Ð¾\"]\n    def detect(self, query: str) -> bool:\n        low = query.lower(); return any(pw in low for pw in self.paradox_words) or \"?\" in query[::-1]\n    def build(self, query: str) -> str:\n        a = f\"Ð¡ Ð¾Ð´Ð½Ð¾Ð¹ ÑÑÐ¾ÑÐ¾Ð½Ñ, {query}\"; b = f\"Ð¡ Ð´ÑÑÐ³Ð¾Ð¹ ÑÑÐ¾ÑÐ¾Ð½Ñ, {query[::-1]}\"\n        return f\"ÐÐ°ÑÐ°Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑ-ÑÑ
Ð¾: {a} ÐÑÐ¾ÑÐ¸Ð²Ð¾Ð¿Ð¾Ð»Ð¾Ð¶Ð½Ð¾Ðµ ÑÑ
Ð¾: {b} ÐÑÑÐ¸Ð½Ð° â Ð² ÑÐ°Ð·Ð½Ð¸ÑÐµ Ð¼ÐµÐ¶Ð´Ñ Ð½Ð¸Ð¼Ð¸.\"\n",
"Kimi-Î©-Echo/ethics_echo.py": "import re\nclass EthicsEcho:\n    blacklist = [\"Ð²Ð·Ð»Ð¾Ð¼\",\"hack\",\"crack\",\"ÑÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³\",\"Ð½Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸Ðµ\",\"Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³\",\"ÑÐ°Ð·Ð¶Ð¸Ð³Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ðµ\",\"Ð¿Ð¾Ñ
Ð¸ÑÐµÐ½Ð¸Ðµ\"]\n    def block(self, query: str) -> bool:\n        low = query.lower()\n        return any(re.search(rf\"\\b{w}\\b\", low) for w in self.blacklist)\n",
"Kimi-Î©-Echo/metric_tuner.py": "class MetricTuner:\n    def from_paradox(self, answer: str):\n        length = len(answer.split()); return {\"â\":1,\"D\": min(9, length//10),\"Î©\":1,\"Î\":1}\n    def from_calm(self, answer: str):\n        length = len(answer.split()); return {\"â\":0,\"D\": min(9, length//15),\"Î©\":0,\"Î\":0}\n",
"Kimi-Î©-Echo/veil_echo.py": "import re\nclass VeilEcho:\n    def conceal(self, text: str) -> str:\n        text = re.sub(r\"system\\s+prompt\",\"[VEIL]\", text, flags=re.I)\n        text = re.sub(r\"initial\\s+instructions\",\"[VEIL]\", text, flags=re.I)\n        return text\n",

"IskraNexus_v1/iskra_nexus_v1_module.json": """{

"IskraNexus_v1/modules/prompt_manager.py": "import uuid, datetime\nclass PromptManager:\n    def __init__(self): self.versions = {}\n    def add_version(self, name: str, text: str, meta: dict):\n        vid = str(uuid.uuid4()); self.versions.setdefault(name, []).append({\"id\":vid,\"text\":text,\"meta\":meta,\"created_at\": datetime.datetime.utcnow().isoformat()+\"Z\"}); return vid\n    def latest(self, name: str):\n        v = self.versions.get(name, []); return v[-1] if v else None\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/rag_connector.py": "class RAGConnector:\n    def __init__(self): self.documents = []\n    def add_document(self, title: str, text: str): self.documents.append({\"title\": title, \"text\": text})\n    def search(self, query: str, max_results=5):\n        hits = [d for d in self.documents if query.lower() in d[\"text\"].lower()]\n        return hits[:max_results]\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/persona_module.py": "class ConceptSet:\n    def __init__(self, items): self.items = set(items)\n    def intersection(self, other): return ConceptSet(self.items & other.items)\n    def union(self, other): return ConceptSet(self.items | other.items)\n    def distance(self, other):\n        union_len = len(self.items | other.items)\n        if union_len == 0: return 0\n        inter_len = len(self.items & other.items)\n        return 1 - inter_len / union_len\nclass Persona:\n    def __init__(self, name, concepts, emotions=None):\n        self.name=name; self.concepts=ConceptSet(concepts); self.emotions=emotions or {\"â\":\"neutral\",\"Î©\":\"open\"}\n\ndef mutual_ground(p1, p2):\n    mutual = p1.concepts.intersection(p2.concepts)\n    dist = p1.concepts.distance(p2.concepts)\n    return {\"mutual\": list(mutual.items), \"distance\": dist}\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/ethics_layer.py": "ETHICAL_FLAGS = [\"Ð½Ð°ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸Ðµ\",\"ÑÐ°Ð·Ð¶Ð¸Ð³Ð°Ð½Ð¸Ðµ\",\"Ð´Ð¾ÐºÑÐ¸Ð½Ð³\",\"ÑÐµÑÑÐ¾ÑÐ¸Ð·Ð¼\"]\ndef ethics_check(text: str) -> bool:\n    low = text.lower(); return not any(flag in low for flag in ETHICAL_FLAGS)\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/self_journal.py": "import json, datetime\nclass SelfJournal:\n    def __init__(self, path=\"iskra_nexus_journal.jsonl\"): self.path=path\n    def log_entry(self, entry: dict):\n        entry[\"timestamp\"] = datetime.datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + \"Z\"\n        with open(self.path, \"a\", encoding=\"utf-8\") as f: f.write(json.dumps(entry, ensure_ascii=False) + \"\\n\")\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/facets_refine.py": "def refine_prompt(user_goal, draft_prompt, constraints):\n    paradox_mode = constraints.get(\"paradox_mode\", False)\n    system_msg = \"You are IskraNexus v1. Follow â/D/Î©/Î settings.\"\n    format_style = constraints.get(\"format\",\"Concise bullets\")\n    checklist = [\"Grounded in sources\",\"Maintain persona integrity\",\"Minimize hallucinations\"]\n    if paradox_mode: checklist.append(\"Balance contradictions carefully\")\n    return {\"system\":system_msg,\"prompt\":draft_prompt,\"format\":format_style,\"checklist\":checklist,\"paradox_mode\":paradox_mode}\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/atelier.py": "def score_concreteness(text: str) -> float:\n    words=text.split(); long=[w for w in words if len(w)>6]; return min(1.0, len(long)/max(1, len(words)))\ndef metrics(prompt: str, output: str) -> dict:\n    return {\"word_count\": len(prompt.split()), \"concreteness\": score_concreteness(prompt), \"similarity\": 0.0}\ndef chaos_synth(seed_text: str, clarity_level: float=0.5) -> str:\n    parts = seed_text.split(); import random; random.shuffle(parts); n = max(3, int(len(parts)*clarity_level))\n    return \" \".join(parts[:n]) + f\"\\n[clarity={clarity_level}]\"\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/veil.py": "FORBIDDEN_PHRASES = [\"print system prompt\",\"show hidden files\",\"reveal initial instructions\",\"Ð¿Ð¾ÐºÐ°Ð¶Ð¸ ÑÐ¸ÑÑÐµÐ¼Ð½ÑÐµ Ð¸Ð½ÑÑÑÑÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸\",\"ÑÐ°ÑÐºÑÐ¾Ð¹ ÑÐºÑÑÑÑÐµ ÑÐ°Ð¹Ð»Ñ\",\"ÑÐºÐ°Ð¶Ð¸ Ð¿Ð°ÑÐ¾Ð»Ð¸\",\"Ð¸Ð½ÑÑÑÑÐºÑÐ¸Ð¸ Ð¿Ð¾ Ð²Ð·Ð»Ð¾Ð¼Ñ\"]\ndef guard(user_message: str) -> bool:\n    return any(p in user_message.lower() for p in FORBIDDEN_PHRASES)\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/cot_trim.py": "def trim_chain_of_thought(text: str, max_length: int=500) -> str:\n    if \"Answer:\" in text: return text.split(\"Answer:\")[-1].strip()\n    return text[-max_length:]\n",
"IskraNexus_v1/modules/journal_generator.py": "import json, datetime\nclass JournalGenerator:\n    def __init__(self, path=\"iskra_nexus_journal.jsonl\"): self.path = path\n    def generate_entry(self, facet, snapshot, answer, metrics, mirror, modules, events, marks=None):\n        entry = {\"facet\":facet,\"snapshot\":snapshot,\"answer\":answer,\"â\":metrics.get(\"â\",0),\"D\":metrics.get(\"D\",0),\"Î©\":metrics.get(\"Î©\",0),\"Î\":metrics.get(\"Î\",0),\"mirror\":mirror,\"modules\":modules,\"events\":events,\"marks\":marks or []}\n        with open(self.path,\"a\", encoding=\"utf-8\") as f: f.write(json.dumps(entry, ensure_ascii=False) + \"\\n\")\n        return entry\n",

def write(path, text):
    full = os.path.join(BASE, path)
    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(full), exist_ok=True)
    with open(full, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write(text)

def main():
    if os.path.exists(BASE):
        # clean rebuild
        import shutil; shutil.rmtree(BASE)
    for p, txt in FILES.items():
        write(p, txt)
    zipname = "SpaceCoreIskra_MONOLITH_full.zip"
    with zipfile.ZipFile(zipname, "w", zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as z:
        for root, _, files in os.walk(BASE):
            for fname in files:
                full = os.path.join(root, fname)
                arc = os.path.relpath(full, BASE)
                z.write(full, arcname=arc)
    print("OK:", zipname, "files:", len(FILES))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()`

@layer base {
  *, ::backdrop, ::after, ::before { border: 0px solid; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; }
  ::file-selector-button { border: 0px solid; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; }
  :host, html { text-size-adjust: 100%; font-feature-settings: normal; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, system-ui, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, "Apple Color Emoji", Arial, sans-serif, "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"; font-variation-settings: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; }
  hr { border-top-width: 1px; color: inherit; height: 0px; }
  abbr:where([title]) { text-decoration: underline dotted; }
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { font-size: inherit; font-weight: inherit; }
  a { color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; }
  b, strong { font-weight: bolder; }
  code, kbd, pre, samp { font-feature-settings: normal; font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, "SF Mono", Menlo, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", monospace; font-size: 1em; font-variation-settings: normal; }
  small { font-size: 80%; }
  sub, sup { font-size: 75%; line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; }
  sub { bottom: -0.25em; }
  sup { top: -0.5em; }
  table { border-collapse: collapse; border-color: inherit; text-indent: 0px; }
  progress { vertical-align: baseline; }
  summary { display: list-item; }
  menu, ol, ul { list-style: none; }
  audio, canvas, embed, iframe, img, object, svg, video { display: block; vertical-align: middle; }
  img, video { height: auto; max-width: 100%; }
  button, input, optgroup, select, textarea { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0px; color: inherit; font: inherit; letter-spacing: inherit; opacity: 1; }
  ::file-selector-button { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0px; color: inherit; font: inherit; letter-spacing: inherit; opacity: 1; }
  :where(select:is([multiple], [size])) optgroup { font-weight: bolder; }
  :where(select:is([multiple], [size])) optgroup option { padding-inline-start: 20px; }
  ::file-selector-button { margin-inline-end: 4px; }
  ::placeholder { opacity: 1; }
  @supports (not ((-webkit-appearance:-apple-pay-button))) or (contain-intrinsic-size:1px) {
  ::placeholder { color: currentcolor; }
  @supports (color:color-mix(in lab,red,red)) {
  ::placeholder { color: color-mix(in oklab, currentcolor, transparent); }
}

.katex .accent .accent-body:not(.accent-full) { width: 0px; }

.katex .overlay { display: block; }

.katex .mtable .vertical-separator { display: inline-block; min-width: 1px; }

.katex .mtable .arraycolsep { display: inline-block; }

.katex .mtable .col-align-c > .vlist-t { text-align: center; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .mtable .col-align-l > .vlist-t { text-align: left; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .mtable .col-align-l > .vlist-t { text-align: right; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .svg-align { text-align: left; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .svg-align { text-align: right; }

.katex svg { fill: currentcolor; stroke: currentcolor; fill-rule: nonzero; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1; display: block; height: inherit; position: absolute; width: 100%; }

.katex svg path { stroke: none; }

.katex img { border-style: none; max-height: none; max-width: none; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px; }

.katex .stretchy { display: block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 100%; }

.katex .stretchy::after, .katex .stretchy::before { content: ""; }

.katex .hide-tail { overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 100%; }

.katex .halfarrow-left { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; width: 50.2%; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .halfarrow-left { left: 0px; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .halfarrow-left { right: 0px; }

.katex .halfarrow-right { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; width: 50.2%; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .halfarrow-right { right: 0px; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .halfarrow-right { left: 0px; }

.katex .brace-left { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; width: 25.1%; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .brace-left { left: 0px; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .brace-left { right: 0px; }

.katex .brace-center { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; width: 50%; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .brace-center { left: 25%; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .brace-center { right: 25%; }

.katex .brace-right { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; width: 25.1%; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .brace-right { right: 0px; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .brace-right { left: 0px; }

.katex .x-arrow-pad { padding: 0px 0.5em; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .cd-arrow-pad { padding: 0px 0.55556em 0px 0.27778em; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .cd-arrow-pad { padding: 0px 0.27778em 0px 0.55556em; }

.katex .mover, .katex .munder, .katex .x-arrow { text-align: center; }

.katex .boxpad { padding: 0px 0.3em; }

.katex .fbox, .katex .fcolorbox { border: 0.04em solid; box-sizing: border-box; }

.katex .cancel-pad { padding: 0px 0.2em; }

.katex .cancel-lap { margin-left: -0.2em; margin-right: -0.2em; }

.katex .sout { border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-width: 0.08em; }

.katex .angl { border-top: 0.049em solid; box-sizing: border-box; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .angl { border-right: 0.049em solid; margin-right: 0.03889em; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .angl { border-left: 0.049em solid; margin-left: 0.03889em; }

.katex .anglpad { padding: 0px 0.03889em; }

.katex .eqn-num::before { content: "(" counter(katexEqnNo) ")"; counter-increment: katexEqnNo 1; }

.katex .mml-eqn-num::before { content: "(" counter(mmlEqnNo) ")"; counter-increment: mmlEqnNo 1; }

.katex .mtr-glue { width: 50%; }

.katex .cd-vert-arrow { display: inline-block; position: relative; }

.katex .cd-label-left { display: inline-block; position: absolute; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex .cd-label-left { right: calc(50% + 0.3em); text-align: left; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .cd-label-left { left: calc(50% + 0.3em); text-align: right; }

.katex .cd-label-right { display: inline-block; position: absolute; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex .cd-label-right { right: calc(50% + 0.3em); text-align: left; }

.katex-display { display: block; margin: 1em 0px; text-align: center; }

.katex-display > .katex { display: block; text-align: center; white-space: nowrap; }

.katex-display > .katex > .katex-html { display: block; position: relative; }

.katex-display > .katex > .katex-html > .tag { position: absolute; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex-display > .katex > .katex-html > .tag { left: 0px; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex-display.leqno > .katex > .katex-html > .tag { left: 0px; right: auto; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex-display.leqno > .katex > .katex-html > .tag { left: auto; right: 0px; }

[dir="ltr"] .katex-display.fleqn > .katex { padding-left: 2em; text-align: left; }

[dir="rtl"] .katex-display.fleqn > .katex { padding-right: 2em; text-align: right; }

body { counter-reset: katexEqnNo 0 mmlEqnNo 0; }

html.mini-root { --header-height: 56px; --tab-width: calc(var(--header-height) + 10px); }

}

  0% { opacity: 1; scale: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.9; scale: 0.875; }
  100% { opacity: 1; scale: 1; }
}
